description: This file implements a Flutter widget for a settings bottom sheet, allowing users to change language preferences and toggle notifications. It includes UI elements such as ListTile, SwitchListTile, and custom language picker.

classes.name: SettingsSheet
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing a bottom sheet for user settings, such as language selection and notification toggling.

classes.name: _SettingsSheetState
classes.description: State class managing the UI and interactions within the SettingsSheet widget.

classes.name: _LanguagePicker
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of languages for selection, updating the parent widget with the chosen language.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the SettingsSheet widget.

methods.description: Constructs the UI of the SettingsSheet, including language and notification options.
